ClassSwapB.name: ClassSwapB
ClassSwapB.desc: Gives 1 Elite Class Swap token. Use this to swap between elite classes of a certain category, like Blood Berserker to Divine Knight

Timecandy9.name: Timecandy9
Timecandy9.desc: 20% OFF NORMAL PRICE! A time candy that gives a random amount of time! @ These candies give up to 500 hours, but on average give 24 hrs.

EquipmentRings34.name: EquipmentRings34
EquipmentRings34.desc: All kills in World 5 count for 1.30x for opening portals to the next map. Helps you get to World 6 faster! 30% Faster to be exact!

EquipmentRings31.name: EquipmentRings31
EquipmentRings31.desc: All kills in World 3 count for 1.30x for opening portals to the next map. Helps you get to World 4 faster! 30% Faster to be exact!

GemP35.name: GemP35
GemP35.desc: Gives you a random Square Hyper Obol! The four equal possibilites are +10% DROP RATE, +5% ALL STAT, +12% DAMAGE, and +6% MULTIKILL PER TIER!

desc: 23% OFF NORMAL PRICE! 500 arcade balls. Use these at the Arcade, found at the clown in World 2 town!
500 arcade balls. Use these at the Arcade, found at the clown in World 2 town! +33% better value compared to smol ball pack!
Use this on a 3 star card to upgrade it to 4 stars! You can use it on any 3 star card you have, it's up to you! Each purchase allows for one card of your choice to be upgraded.
99.99999% OFF NORMAL PRICE! Use this on a 3 star card to upgrade it to 4 stars instantly! No randomness involved! You'll see where to use these by clicking a card in game.
10% OFF NORMAL PRICE! Use this on a 4 star card to upgrade it to 5 stars! It works like 4 star cardifiers do, you get to choose which card gets upgraded!
20% OFF NORMAL PRICE! Use this on a 4 star card to upgrade it to 5 stars! It works like 4 star cardifiers do, you get to choose which card gets upgraded, no randomness involved!
Excuse me sir, but would you be interested in some of my balls? You are?? Great! I have some here just for you, free of charge! 1 gem fee though.
30 arcade balls. Use these at the Arcade, found at the clown in World 2 town!
